snippet: Few major politicians are better than Gov. Pete Wilson at spotting a cutting-edge issue early in a race and then hopping on it for a good ride.   Last year Mr. Wilson rode the immigration issue to a come-from-behind re-election victory. This time ...
lead_paragraph: Few major politicians are better than Gov. Pete Wilson at spotting a cutting-edge issue early in a race and then hopping on it for a good ride. Last year Mr. Wilson rode the immigration issue to a come-from-behind re-election victory. This time around, as he seeks the 1996 Republican Presidential nomination, he is getting a good ride on the affirmative action issue.

headline.main: Wilson Goes Surfing on Affirmative-Action Issue
